name: Our inaugural meetup!

venue.name: Just Eat
venue.address_1: 2nd Floor Broad Quay House, Prince Street, BS1 4DJ

description:
This will be our first meetup and hopefully a great start to our new Google Developer Group. We have 2 talks scheduled, and we are kindly being hosted by Just Eat who will provide beer and pizza. I wonder if they'll use their own app to order it?

Rough Schedule:

19:00 - Meet and greet, have a drink and get to know each other!

19:30 - Intro to the GDG, Google's global developer community

19:45 - Andre will give a show and tell on Google Pub/Sub, the asynchronous messaging service that Google use to send 500 million messages per second.

20:15 - Tim will give a demonstration of automating Google Cloud infrastructure with Terraform.

20:45 - Closing comments, further beer & pizza.

We hope to see you there, and in the meantime please find out more about our group on our main meetup page.

name: Flutter Live! Viewing Party

venue.name: Just Eat
venue.address_1: 2nd Floor Broad Quay House, Prince Street, BS1 4DJ

description:
We're having a party!

On 4th December Google are hosting Flutter Live! - An event where they will be sharing a variety of news and updates about Flutter.

The session on 4th starts early, so we hosting a viewing party the day after on Wed 5th Dec where you can come and eat pizza, have some drinks, and watch the re-run of the livestream with us. You will also have the opportunity to network with your peers and ask us any questions that you may have.

After the stream, we will do a code lab which we encourage you to follow along. You'll be able to see just how easy it is to put together a fully functional Android/iOS app with a single codebase written in Dart.

Here's the agenda:

6:00 pm - Attendee arrival, drinks and networking
6:30 pm - Flutter Live! keynote speeches
8:00 pm - Break/drinks/pizza
8:15 pm - Flutter Code Lab
9:00 Close/pub

We really hope you will be able to join us. There will be some great highlights from the keynote!

For further info about Flutter see below:

Flutter homepage - http://flutter.io
Intro to Flutter - https://youtu.be/fq4N0hgOWzU
Twitter - @flutterio

name: Firebase, Kubernetes and Serverless Video Intelligence
description:
18:30 - Arrive and interact with other humans!
19:00 - Firebase from within Kubernetes - A show-n-tell from Andre
19:30 - Serverless Video Intelligence - A round up of serverless options in GCP with a live demo from Tim
20:30 - You don't have to go home but you can't stay here :-)

We will also hand out Qwiklabs vouchers so you can try out the code from the serverless demo yourself.

Venue hire and light refreshments are sponsored by www.claranet.co.uk!
how_to_find_us: We will be meeting in the DeskLodge Oak Tree room on the 4th floor of the old Evening Post building.
